text: Rasskazhi mnogobozhnikam istoriyu Khuda, brata aditov, kogda on predupredil svoy narod, zhivushchiy v al'- Akhkaf - a do nego i posle nego uzhe prikhodili poslanniki s podobnymi uveshchevaniyami, -skazav: "Ne poklonyaytes' nikomu, krome Allakha. YA boyus', chto vas porazit nakazaniye Dnya velikogo svoim uzhasom
